help¶

Purpose:

Show help on a command or other topic.
Usage:

brz help [TOPIC]
Options:
-h, --help

Show help message.

--long

Show help on all commands.

-q, --quiet

Only display errors and warnings.

--usage

Show usage message and options.

-v, --verbose

Display more information.
Aliases:

?, –help, -?, -h
See also:

topics
